745540.name: EcoQuest: Explore, Discover, Protect!
745540.description:
Experience an unparalleled eco-adventure in "Eco Quest: Explore, Discover, Protect!" Put yourself in the shoes of Kai, an ardent environmentalist hell-bent on changing the way people around the globe think about water and the environment.

Kai faces obstacles, mysteries, and encounters reflecting real-life problems on his trip through a world of wastefulness and disregard for environmental concerns. Kai embarks on a mission to ignite a flame of reform by revolutionising communities' detrimental traditions, armed with information, invention, and unrelenting drive.

This is more than just a game; it's a call to arms, a chance to join Kai on a mission where your small contribution goes a big way towards creating a better, more sustainable world. In "Eco Quest: Explore, Discover, Protect!," your actions have a significant impact.
745540.supported_languages: 英语, 意大利语, 法语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语
